title: Sean McVay: Matthew Stafford saying he's in gives us confidence for how we move forward

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Sean McVay: Matthew Stafford saying he's in gives us confidence for how we move forward
sources.description: Matthew Stafford had let Rams head coach Sean McVay and General Manager Les Snead know that he would be back with the club for 2026 before telling the world during his MVP acceptance speech on Thursday night.
